overview: Lorrane is a bisexual young woman, resident of the Baixada Fluminense. Following a day in Lorrane's life, interspersed with testimonies from LGBT people who also reside in the Baixada, we come to the following debate: what is different in the life of an LGBT person compared to that of anyone else? L.G.Baixada.T. sets out to answer that question.
title: L.G.Baixada.T.
